title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1388/1999 of 28 June 1999 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1388/1999
of 28 June 1999
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 are hereby replaced by the Annexes to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 246, 5.11.1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 20, 27.1.1998, p. 16.
(3) OJ L 161, 23.6.1976, p. 10.
(4) OJ L 183, 26.6.1998, p. 15.
